field.label: Enable peers
field.help: Enable or disable HAProxy peers. This will propagate entries of any data-types in stick-tables between several HAProxy instances over TCP connections in a multi-master fashion.

field.label: Peer name (FQDN)
field.help: The name of the peer. This is usually the fully qualified domain name. If the name matches the system hostname, then this peer is automatically configured as local peer.

field.label: Listen address (IP)
field.help: The listen address of the local peer or the address of the remote peer.

field.label: TCP Port
field.help: The TCP port that should be used for connections to this peer. It must not be used by any other service.
